metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6809 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: When a Web Extension had the all-urls permission and made a fetch request with a mode set to 'same-origin', it was possible for the Web Extension to read local files. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 74.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '74.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
